entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -12.3°C

Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:17 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
